channel.title: Help with server. (how to make other can join?)
channel.description: Hey everyone,i created a server, i can join to my own server, but how to make people can join to server? I created no-ip.com host. But how people can join to my server? Btw i new at server creating so i stucked here :/ Answer with steps what to do :)

item.title: Help with server. (how to make other can join?)
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

Hey zibas2, If you want to create and run a server it’s best to do a little research into them…

First off to answer your question:

You need to make sure your server is running on your machine either local or vps.

Clients connect to servers through sockets in java basically a server sits on a computer and occupies a opened port (see port forwarding).

By opening a port and running the server on that port you are Listening for a connection but the client has to be told where in the world that server is listening at because you know there’s a ton of computers and stuff… (See ip addresses)

The client also needs to know what port to connect to ports separate network traffic on a computer (Because how is a email server supposed to understand you just killed graador and want your loot XD)

Now I’m terrible at explaining things and stuff so you should probably forget all that if you feel even a little confused lol. basically open the port and and make sure client and server ips match
in addition to any other security uid or rsa keys then test the connection with a status checker.

Anyways you should do a little research or your server will surely fail creating and running a successful server is no easy task to begin with think about the different roles there are to play and which one you are best suited to.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with server. (how to make other can join?)
